short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase of 35,000 challenge coins for employee memento for it’s 150 years of service to the public and security of our country.
description: The contract is for the purchase of 35,000 challenge coins for employee memento for it’s 150 years of service to the public and security of our country. All the deliverables must be received on or before May 5th 2023.
